author: slodkokwasny.
content:
Today both Polygon and zkSync announced their zkEVM (EVM-equivalent) rollups. zkSync plans mainnet launch in 100 days (testnet launched in February), Polygon testnet launch in Q3 2022 and mainnet in early 2023.

https://matterlabs.medium.com/100-days-to-mainnet-6f230893bd73
https://blog.polygon.technology/the-future-is-now-for-ethereum-scaling-introducing-polygon-zkevm/
